dfu_step_set_update_mode: Step 1: Put your {tracker} tracker into update mode.
dfu_step_flash: Step 3: Flash the selected firmware to your {tracker} tracker.
dfu_step_set_update_mode_note: This will turn your tracker into DFU mode, letting the trackers appear as something similar to "HaritoraXW-UPDATE".
dfu_step_select_update_mode_note: Select the tracker that is now in update mode. It should appear as something similar to "HaritoraXW-UPDATE".
dfu_step_flash_note: This will flash the selected firmware to your tracker.
disclaimer: I am not responsible for any damage caused by the upgrade/downgrade of the firmware on your trackers. You agree to use this tool at your own risk.
